Spokane_Valley.Avista Stadium: Avista Stadium is an outdoor athletic venue in the northwest United States, located in Spokane, Washington. It is the home ballpark of the Spokane Indians, a minor league baseball team in the short-season Class A-Short Season Northwest League, and an affiliate of the Texas Rangers. Located at the fairgrounds east of downtown, the elevation of the playing field is 1,910 feet (580 m) above sea level.
